content: I cannot predict future events, but there are always certain games in every nfl season that are expected to be challenging for teams. the ravens are part of a highly competitive afc north division, which includes teams like the pittsburgh steelers and the cleveland browns, both of which have strong rosters and are expected to compete for playoff berths. the ravens also play against other tough teams like the green bay packers and the kansas city chiefs, who were both conference championship contenders last season. it remains to be seen how the ravens will fare against these challenging opponents, but they have a talented roster and a strong coaching staff that can help them compete with any team in the league.
